string.name: lichessCombinationLiveLightLibrePronounced
string.comment:
Keep live/light/libre if a translation doesn't make sense in your language.
Some further context on what these mean:
Live, in that you can do games in real time. The way Lichess did this in 2010, at the time of founding, was particularly innovative.
Light, in that it is lightweight (on hardware resources) and will run well on most computers and phones. A serious technical challenge.
Libre, in the sense of 'free software' (as in freedom). More on this here: https://www.gnu.org/philosophy/free-sw.html

resources.string: Lichess — гэта камбінацыя live/light/libre і chess. Lichess вымаўляцца як %1$s.
Вы можаце даведацца больш пра %1$s (уключаючы %2$s). Калі вы хочаце дапамагчы Lichess валанцёрствам, сваімі навыкамі і часам, то ёсць шмат %3$s.
Ёсць лі іншыя сайты, якія былі заснаваныя на Lichess?
Так. Lichess натхніў многія сайты, якія цяпер выкарыстоўваюць наш %1$s, %2$s и %3$s.

string.name: inferiorThanXsEqualYtimeControl
string.comment:
inferiorThanXsEqualYtimeControl
Used for several time controls:
https://lichess.org/faq#time-controls
%1$s is the number of seconds %2$s is the name of the time control (Bullet, Blitz, Rapid, etc)
